title: UI freezes on search
description: application becomes unresponsive after typing 3 characters in the search box

title: Incorrect total in invoice
description: invoice total calculation excludes discounts for some items

title: Login token expires early
description: session token invalidates after 5 minutes instead of 30

title: Image upload corrupts file
description: uploaded PNGs become unreadable on certain resolutions

title: Notification email missing link
description: password reset email does not include the reset link for some users

title: Slow response on dashboard
description: dashboard API call takes >10s when user has >1k entries

title: Export CSV encodes incorrectly
description: CSV export uses wrong character encoding for special characters

title: Mobile layout broken on iPhone SE
description: header overlaps content on small-screen devices

title: Race condition saving settings
description: concurrent saves occasionally revert to previous values
